title: Swarna Deepthi Jhumkas: Diamond & Pearl Gold Earrings
features: Intricate filigree detailing with diamond accents. The jhumka features a floral stud with diamond embellishments, connected to a bell-shaped drop adorned with a delicate openwork design set with diamonds. Finished with a cluster of lustrous South Sea pearl drops. Traditional Telugu design sensibilities meet modern craftsmanship.
occasions: and special celebrations. Also perfect for adding a touch of elegance to contemporary outfits.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship using high-quality materials. The combination of gold, diamonds, and pearls creates a timeless and luxurious look. A perfect blend of traditional Telugu aesthetics and modern design. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster and durability. These Jhumkas make a treasured heirloom piece.
